content: I've been checking out @Geoffrey Irving's interval arithmetic library. Has this been ported into Mathlib? (I'm especially interested in the content about floating points)
I think the closest thing we have is docs#NonemptyInterval, and the fact that for non-negative intervals it forms a semiring
Thanks! We don't need to work with it ourselves right now, but I'm looking for the best place to cite it. I take it we'll cite Geoffrey's Github repo, instead of Mathlib, then.
Tyler Josephson ⚛️ has marked this topic as resolved.
Yep, citing the repo is good; sorry for delayed reply. And I’m very curious for comments or improvements!
